data.actual_result: Image thumbnail is replaced with a paperclip
data.short_description: Importing images from device to Discord results in the image having no preview.
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap the attach file button - Tap the import button - Either select import from Gphotos or your devices' gallery (tested with both) - Observe that there is no image preview above the text field. Instead there's a paperclip image
